alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NASH...WEST CENTRAL EDGECOMBE...NORTHWESTERN WILSON AND SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 541 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Nashville to 9 miles east of Bunn to near Bailey, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Nashville, Wilson, Elm City, Dortches, Bailey, Bunn, Red Oak, Sharpsburg and Spring Hope. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
